articles.author: Rory Sullivan
articles.title: Anne Sacoolas to face court charged with causing death of Harry Dunn in crash - The Independent
articles.description: It is thought that the 44-year-old American citizen will appear via video-link from the US
articles.content:
Anne Sacoolas, the woman accused of killing 19-year-old British motorcyclist Harry Dunn, will face court proceedings in January, the Crown Prosecution Service (CPS) has said.

articles.author: David K. Li
articles.title: U.S. sets somber record as Covid deaths surpass 800,000, more than any other country - NBC News
articles.description: The United States passed another grim Covid-19 milestone Monday, as more than 800,000 Americans have now died from the virus.
articles.content:
The United States passed another grim Covid-19 milestone Monday, as more than 800,000 Americans have now died from the virus that's plagued the country for nearly two years.
